data.title: Expedia
data.subtitle: Associate Software Development Intern
data.description: I worked across teams building both web and mobile apps for hotel management and discovering new destinations. Within the 3 months I was there, I made improvements to live sites and apps to benefit Expedia's customers and hotel partners in the areas of UI, accessibility and notifications.

data.title: Online Solutions Experts
data.subtitle: Intern
data.description: I assisted with the creation of an e-commerce website for a Brisbane-based mountain bike store, involving work with Magento, Retail Express and debugging PHP.
